Holy Symbols.Name: Amulet
Holy Symbols.Description: A small amulet representing a deity or higher power, often worn around the neck.

Holy Symbols.Name: Emblem
Holy Symbols.Description: A religious emblem or symbol used to display one's faith.

Holy Symbols.Name: Reliquary
Holy Symbols.Description: A container or shrine for holding sacred relics or items of religious significance.

Holy Symbols.Name: Medallion
Holy Symbols.Description: A medallion with an engraved religious symbol, often worn as a pendant.

Holy Symbols.Name: Holy Symbol - Wooden
Holy Symbols.Description: A simple wooden holy symbol, carved with religious markings.

Holy Symbols.Name: Holy Symbol - Silver
Holy Symbols.Description: A holy symbol crafted from silver, often used by priests and clerics.

Holy Symbols.Name: Holy Symbol - Gold
Holy Symbols.Description: A holy symbol made from gold, representing great devotion to a deity.
